item.title: PUPpy
item.description: PUPpy (Phylogenetically Unique Primers in python) is a fully automated pipeline to design taxon-specific primers for any defined microbial community. PUPpy can design both microbe-specific primers, which selectively amplify individual members of a community, and group-specific primers, which selectively amplify user-selected members. PUPpy-designed primers can be used to quantify substrain-level absolute microbial counts with droplet digital PCR (ddPCR), providing more resolved and accurate quantification in gnotobiotic communities than 16S and shotgun sequencing.
